title: HighPoint Solutions, LLC Named Workday Services Partner
text:
HighPoint Solutions, LLC Named Workday Services Partner   HighPoint Solutions, LLC Named Workday Services Partner -- EAST NORRITON, Pa., Sept. 14,    > EAST NORRITON, Pa. , Sept. 14,   HighPoint Solutions, LLC., a premier, global provider of specialized IT services dedicated to the life sciences and healthcare industries, announced today that it has been named a Workday Services Partner. Workday (NYSE: WDAY ) is a leader in enterprise cloud applications for finance and human resources. As a Workday Services Partner, HighPoint Solutions will focus on helping customers transform their businesses by successfully deploying Workday's cloud-based applications - Workday Financial Management and Workday Human Capital Management (HCM) â€“ that support a complete range of financial and people-based processes. With Workday, customers are equipped with real-time operational visibility along with the speed and agility to adapt to changing business needs, market demands, and growth objectives. HighPoint Solutions is focused on enabling its customers' success thanks to its technical and functional expertise with Workday and extensive experience in the life sciences, healthcare, and technology sectors. HighPoint Solutions will also provide advisory and change management services along with data management and conversion solutions that will help customers realize the full benefits of deploying Workday. "We're proud to join the Workday partner ecosystem, and to have Workday as an official partner," said Chris Colapietro , executive vice president, technology and marketing, HighPoint Solutions. "Through this relationship, HighPoint is well positioned to help mutual customers grow their business by moving to the cloud." For more information about HighPoint Solutions and their upcoming events, please visit www.highpointsolutions.com . About HighPoint Solutions HighPoint Solutions is a premier, global provider of specialized IT services with vertically- focused business consulting, system integration, professional service, and managed hosting solutions for life sciences and healthcare companies. Since 2000, our 650+ consultants have provided business consulting and technology solutions that continue to deliver business value and competitive advantage to more than 170 clients globally. 
SOURCE HighPoint Solutions, LLC
